title.rendered: Vitakraft® Crunch Sticks Wild Berries & Honey Guinea Pig Treat

content.rendered:
Ingredients:
Rabbit with Ground Bone, Olive Oil, Pumpkin Seed, Potassium Chloride, Organic Cranberries, Organic Spinach, Organic Broccoli, Organic Beets, Sodium Phosphate Monobasic, Organic Carrots, Organic Squash, Organic Apples, Organic Blueberries, Choline Chloride, Dried Pediococcus Acidilactici Fermentation Product, Dried Lactobacillus Acidophilus Fermentation Product, Dried Bifidobacterium Longum Fermentation Product, Dried Enterococcus Faecium Fermentation Product, Taurine, Tocopherols (Preservative), Calcium Carbonate, Zinc Proteinate, Zinc Sulfate, Iron Sulfate, Iron Proteinate, Vitamin E Supplement, Niacin, Copper Sulfate, Copper Proteinate, Manganese Sulfate, Sodium Selenite, Manganese Proteinate, Thiamine Mononitrate, Pyridoxine Hydrochloride, Vitamin D3 Supplement, Calcium Iodate

Guaranteed Analysis

Crude protein (min) 30%, Crude fat (min) 15%, Crude fiber (max) 3.5%, Moisture (max) 11%.

excerpt.rendered:
DESCRIPTION
Treat your guinea pig to a crunchy, long-lasting baked treat stick made with whole grains and wild berries, with a tasty berry and honey glaze. Vitakraft Crunch Sticks don’t just taste good: they also promote important chewing needed to wear down guinea pigs’ always-growing teeth for optimum dental health. The triple-baked layers make this treat last longer, with a natural wood chew center that provides hours of chewing fun long after the treat part is gone!

Key Benefits:

Triple baked for crunchiness and taste
Helps with important tooth conditioning
Natural wood stick inside is made to be chewed for long-lasting fun even after the treat is gone
Includes attached clip holder
No artificial colors, flavors, or preservatives

Item Number: 5190682

Brand: Vitakraft

Food Type: Treat

Breed Size: Guinea Pig

Flavor:Wild Berry

Weight: 3.75 oz

Buy this product on petsmart.com
